titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties gracious intention, concerning his commission lately granted, to enquire of new offices erected, and new fees exacted in courts of iustice, since xi⁰ Elizabethæ.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... VVhite-Hall, the twelfth day of October, in the third yeere of our reigne ... .
Arms 12; Steele notation: euer erected 2) may vncertaine.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
